channel.title: Notes on Tim Neville
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Tim Neville

item.title: Hugo Markdown and Front Matter Notes
item.description: Regular paragraphs are just written freely in the .md file. Will automatically linewrap and fit in width of the page. Empty line above is a line break Two empty lines doesn’t make two line breaks Headings # makes a H1 header ## makes a H2 header ### makes a H3 header #### makes a H4 header ##### makes a H5 header Quotes > for a Single line quote Another quote

item.title: Hugonotes
item.description: This site is made using hugo static site generator
